name: 教育統計學（一）
goals: Concepts, knowledge, and relevant examples are provided and explained
Questions are given in/after class for students to solve based on course materials
3.          Demonstration and hand-on experience of using statistical software to analyze datasets are provided. Explanation and interpretation on the results are instructed.
syllabus:
【授課方式：16+2週】自主學習週安排於1/17與1/24，修課同學自行進行資料庫分析練習

本課程使用SPSS統計分析軟體，考試也會用到，若抗拒使用軟體者請不要修課!

因課程連貫性需求，期中考及期末考的時間與校定時間不同，若無法配合調整者請不要修課!
